Flexible.Title: Three main parts of an XML Schema content definition
Flexible.Code: <!-- wrapper element definition --> <xsd:element name="ExampleContentV1Data" type="OpenCmsExampleContentV1Data"/> <xsd:complexType name="OpenCmsExampleContentV1Data"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ExampleContentV1" type="OpenCmsExampleContentV1" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!-- locale specific content element with field definitions --> <xsd:complexType name="OpenCmsExampleContentV1"> [field definitions are left out] <xsd:attribute name="language" type="OpenCmsLocale" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <!-- data and editor configurations --> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> [data and editor configurations are left out] </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation>
